title: I loved this Urgot skin but there is one problem

replies.body:
200 years later...

{{champion:6}}: Can I become a star guardian now?
everyone else: No.
Us: GIVE HIM THE SKIN

I'm telling ya guys.

Gift Robot Nunu 6 RP and all our problems will be solved.

What are you talking about

He guards the industry machine and he is from the lone star state...

Lone...........................................Star guardian Urgot.

There we go!

im surprised they decided to give urgot the high noon theme, idk, it feels so weird, even if the theme itself changed from a more classic western to a more....supernatural one? The splash art is lit tho.

Lucian reminds me of  a cowboy ghost rider.
I would love an urgot skin either waY
